#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import site,workers,control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return class page: def run(self, r): threads = [] ; self.r = [] ; r = [(r.index(i)+1, i) for i in r] for i in r: threads.append(workers.Thread(self.request, i)) [i.start() for i in threads] ; [i.join() for i in threads] return ''.join([str(i[1]) for i in sorted(self.r, key=lambda x: x[0])]) def request(self, i): self.r += [(i[0], site.request(i[1]))] url = 'https://nbareplay.net/page/' u = [] for i in range(1,20): u += [url + str(i)] u = page().run(u) r = re.findall('(?s)<a href="([^"]*)"\s*title="([^"]*).*?src="([^"]*)', u) return r

playurl
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import site import re main = site.request('[makelist.param1]') main = main.split('<strong>Dailymotion<',1)[-1] main = main.split('<strong>Download Links SD<',1)[0] r = re.findall('(?s)wrapper"><a href="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)',main) sort = [(i[0], i[1]) for i in r if 'ydrive.xyz' not in i[0] if 'issuessolution.site' not in i[0]] return sort
